700771f-a.title: Bronx: Claremont Parkway - Park Avenue
700771f-a.text:
Claremont Parkway, at the N.W. corner of Park Ave. (right), show-
ing the Claremont Park station of the New York Central Railroad.
May 24, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
